body_html:
@jart
thanks!
tensorflow binds @protubuf to the protobuf repository at workspace.bzl, while https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/master/WORKSPACE binds @protobuf to the build target (not the repo). the build may fail due to name clash, the error message is something like external/protobuf does not have attribute testonly, which basically says Bazel is trying to use @protobuf as a target but in fact the name is pulled in as a repo by tensorflow, if you have a third repository and pulling in both tensorflow and grpc as external repositories.
